Literature.Title: Copy number variation of PR-39 cathelicidin, and identification of PR-35, a natural variant of PR-39 with reduced mammalian cytotoxicity.
Literature.Author: Jeon H, Thong LM, Ahn B, Cho HS, Van Chanh Quy L, Yum J, Hong K, Kim JH, Song H, Park C

Literature.Title: Bactericidal activities and biochemical features of 16 antimicrobial peptides against bovine-mastitis causative pathogens
Literature.Author: Cho HS, Kim D, Jeon H, Somasundaram P, Soundrarajan N, Park C

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:24.72% Cytotoxicity=64 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=3µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>32µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>32µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 10876(MIC=>32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=9.5µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=9.5µM),Streptococcus agalactiae ATCC 27956(MIC=9.5µM),Streptococcus dysgalactiae subsp. dysgalactiae ATCC 27957(MIC=9.5µM),Streptococcus equi subsp. zooepidemicus ATCC 43079(MIC=9.5µM)
